          <title>
            <string language="es">Conocer y manejar el abecedario</string>
            <string language="en">Knowing and using the alphabet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dem Alphabet kennen und mit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sachant et en utilisant l'alphabet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sabendo e usando o alfabeto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscendo ed usando l'alfabeto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνώση και χρησιμοποίηση του αλφάβητου</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Conocer y manejar con soltura la disposición de las diferentes letras que constituyen el abecedario</string>
            <string language="en">Knowledge and skilful use of the order of the different letters in the alphabet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="es">Abecedario</string>

          </keyword>

der unterschiedlichen Zeichen im Alphabet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La connaissance et utilisation habile de la 
commande des différentes lettres dans l'alphabet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conhecimento e uso skilful da ordem das letras 
diferentes no alfabeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscenza ed uso abile dell'ordine delle lettere
differenti nell'alfabeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνώση και επιδέξια χρήση της κατάταξης των 
διαφορετικών επιστολών στο αλφάβητο.</string>
